    • Uses of OutOfBoundsStrategy in imagingbook.common.filter.generic

      Methods in imagingbook.common.filter.generic with parameters of type OutOfBoundsStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GenericFilter.applyTo​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs)
      Applies this filter to the given ImageProcessor, which is modified; the specified OutOfBoundsStrategy is used to handle out-of-bounds coordinates.
